Physical Therapy

On a New Level.

We help patients throughout DuPage County and Chicagoland restore their quality of life.

Get Started Today

We're ready to serve in your time of need.

We use the most up to date methods in our approach while providing detailed evaluation and treatment.

Our Goal: Addressing Your Condition

We provide the knowledge and techniques of experienced professionals, with customized treatment plans for every single patient that focus on the main cause of the problem - not just symptoms.

Premier has clinics throughout Chicago and DuPage County, offering a range of services including Physical Therapy, Neuropathy, Post Surgery, Vestibular Rehabilitation and Recovery from Sports, Work and Personal Injury.

Our team can help patients reduce pain, swelling or walking problems, improve coordination and increase sensation while building up your body's natural strength and endurance. We'll get you back to your best and teach injury prevention techniques you can use after treatment ends.

PT Services

Physical Therapy

We'll evaluate your injury, discuss the root cause and come up with your treatment plan on your initial visit. We start with traditional PT to reduce pain, restore function and rebuild mobility to the injured area.

Sports, Personal or Work Injury

Don't let injury keep you from the activities you love. We can help you heal and get back to a normal lifestyle, as well as show you how to prevent re-injury and will provide them with home exercises to continue strengthening and restoring function.

Neuropathy

In most cases neuropathy is predominantly sensory, with pain and sensory loss in the hands and feet. Our Physical Therapists will establish a custom treatment program based on thorough evaluation of your symptoms.

Post Surgery

Post-operative physical therapy is important, and rehabilitation exercises can help increase strength, endurance, motion, balance, and coordination. Our physical therapists focus on the functional goals that are important to you.

Why Choose Us

Convenience

Clinics Near You

Your recovery doesn't need a commute. We're local with 14 locations throughout the Chicagoland area, and we offer free transportation for Work and Personal Injury cases.

Personable

We Have Fun

We're a family owned and operated business that treat our patients like one of our own. Get personalized treatment by people who care about you, your recovery and your day.

Reliable

Simple, Speedy Recovery

We've been in business for 17 years. We pride ourselves in helping patients recover both physically and emotionally - no matter the obstacle, we will help you overcome it.
